column4: 2015. local florists mass of christian burial for hector trevino
column10: 2015 at 2:00 p. m. at st. patrick catholic church with fr. raymundo garcia
column11: celebrant. interment will follow in the forest haven cemetery in diboll.	a rosary will be recited at 7:00 p. m. monday at carroway funeral home in lufkin.	mr. trevino was born december 9
column14: 2015 in a lufkin hospital.	mr. trevino was a retired sawmill operator for temple-inland and a longtime resident of diboll. he was a very friendly man
column16: and loved helping people. mr. trevino was the town friend el amigo del pueblo. he was a member of st. patrick catholic church.	survivors include his wife
column17: beatriz trevino of diboll; son and daughter-in-law
column19: jr. and dawn trevino of houston; daughters and sons-in-law
column22: anna delia trevino and albert holmes of lufkin
column24: and maria guadalupe and manuel chagolla of diboll; seventeen grandchildren; seven great grandchildren; as well as numerous nieces
column25: nephews and other relatives.	he was preceded in death by his parents
column26: maria guevara and margarito trevino; three brothers; and one sister.	pallbearers will be hector trevino
column35: and juan jose villanueva.	in lieu of flowers
column36: memorial contributions may be made to st. patrick catholic church
column39: texas 75901.	the family will receive friends and loved ones from 5:00 to 7:00 p. m. monday evening at the funeral home prior to the rosary.	memories and condolences may be added at www. carrowayfuneralhome. com.	carroway funeral home
